languages.text: {n}Тепло рассмеявшись, Арджента подмигивает Паскалю.{/n} "Забудем на время о теологических различиях, брат Паскаль. Мы с тобой несем один свет, и здесь, во тьме, это очевидно как нигде. Я молилась за тебя".

{n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqal.{/n} "Let us forget our theological differences for now, Brother Pasqal. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."
languages.original_text: {n}Тепло рассмеявшись, Арджента подмигивает Паскалю.{/n} "Забудем на время о теологических различиях, брат Паскаль. Мы с тобой несем один свет, и здесь, во тьме, это очевидно как нигде. Я молилась за тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqual.{/n} "Let us forget the theological differences for now, Brother Pasqual. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqal.{/n} "Let us forget our theological differences for now, Brother Pasqal. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは温かい笑みを浮かべながら、パスカルにウィンクをする。{/n}「ブラザー・パスカル、神学的な違いは今は忘れましょう。あなたと私は同じ光を持っている。この暗闇の中で、それは他のどこよりも明らかだ。私はあなたのために祈ってきたの」
languages.original_text: {n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqal.{/n} "Let us forget our theological differences for now, Brother Pasqal. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは温かい笑みを浮かべながら、パスカルにウィンクをする。{/n}「ブラザー・パスカル、神学的な違いは今は忘れましょう。あなたと私は同じ光を持っている。この暗闇の中で、それは他のどこよりも明らかだ。私はあなたのために祈ってきたの」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔温和地笑了起来，朝帕斯卡眨了眨眼。{/n}“帕斯卡兄弟，咱们暂且忘记神学上的分歧吧。你与我散发着相同的光芒，就在这黑暗之中。此时此刻，祂的明光比其他任何时候都更加明亮，我一直都在为你祈祷。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqal.{/n} "Let us forget our theological differences for now, Brother Pasqal. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔温和地笑了起来，朝帕斯卡眨了眨眼。{/n}“帕斯卡兄弟，咱们暂且忘掉神学上的分歧吧。你与我携带着相同的光芒，就在这黑暗之中。此时此刻，祂的明光比其他任何时候都更加明亮，我一直都在为你祈祷。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con una cálida carcajada, Argenta guiña un ojo a Pasqal.{/n} «Olvidemos por ahora nuestras diferencias teológicas, hermano Pasqal. Usted y yo portamos la misma luz y, aquí, en la oscuridad, es más evidente que en ningún otro sitio. He estado rezando por usted».
languages.original_text: {n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqal.{/n} "Let us forget our theological differences for now, Brother Pasqal. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una cálida carcajada, Argenta guiña un ojo a Pasqal.{/n} «Olvidemos por ahora nuestras diferencias teológicas, hermano Pasqal. Usted y yo portamos la misma luz y, aquí, en la oscuridad, es más evidente que en ningún otro sitio. He estado rezando por usted».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit einem warmen Lachen zwinkert Argenta Pasqal zu.{/n} "Vergessen wir unsere theologischen Differenzen doch einmal Bruder Pasqal. Wir beide tragen dasselbe Licht in uns, und hier in der Dunkelheit ist es offensichtlicher als irgendwo sonst. Ich habe für Euch gebetet."
languages.original_text: {n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqal.{/n} "Let us forget our theological differences for now, Brother Pasqal. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem warmen Lachen zwinkert Argenta Pasqal zu.{/n} "Vergessen wir die theologischen Differenzen doch einmal Bruder Pasqal. Wir beide tragen dasselbe Licht in uns, und hier in der Dunkelheit ist es offensichtlicher als irgendwo sonst. Ich habe für Euch gebetet."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Riant de bon cœur, Argenta adresse un clin d'œil à Pasqal.{/n} « Oublions donc nos différends théologiques pour le moment, frère Pasqal. Vous et moi sommes porteurs de la même lumière, et c'est d'autant plus évident ici, dans ces lieux imprégnés de ténèbres. J'ai prié pour vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqal.{/n} "Let us forget our theological differences for now, Brother Pasqal. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta rit de bon cœur.{/n} « Oublions donc nos différends théologiques pour le moment, frère Pasqal, {n}dit-elle en lui adressant un clin d'œil.{/n} Vous et moi sommes porteurs de la même lumière, et c'est d'autant plus évident ici, dans ces lieux imprégnés de ténèbres. J'ai prié pour vous. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}İçtenlikle gülen Argenta, Pasqal'a göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Teolojik görüşlerimizin farklılığını şimdilik göz ardı edelim Rahip Pasqal. İkimizin de ışığı aynı ışık, özellikle bu karanlıkta bunu görmemek elde değil. Dualarım seninleydi."
languages.original_text: {n}With a warm laugh, Argenta winks at Pasqal.{/n} "Let us forget our theological differences for now, Brother Pasqal. You and I carry the same light, and here in the darkness, it is more evident than anywhere else. I have been praying for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}İçtenlikle gülen Argenta, Pasqal'a göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Teolojik görüşlerimizin farklılığını şimdilik göz ardı edelim Rahip Pasqal. İkimizin de ışığı aynı ışık; özellikle bu karanlıkta bunu görmemek elde değil. Dualarım seninleydi."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
